fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Pinpoint: Learn how many true opponents to the Order there are. (People who do not win with Order) [AOR2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Tapwire: Choose a player. Find out if they used an ability this phase, and if it targeted someone else at the end of the phase. [2 use, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Trace: Choose a player. Find out if they played an attacking card last phase. [2 use, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Watch: Learn a random attacking card played by Chaos this phase at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day, Post-Mortem]
- Bug: Pick a player. Learn if they went into a room that isn't listed on the available rooms list. [1 use, Day, Post-Mortem]
